[i]Arcane Caliburnus[/i] – Whenever a red source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Sonya, Vengeful Mage attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Sonya deals 3 damage divided among any number of targets.
Partner with Deen, Bladed Sandstorm
